vivāham kārayām āsa saubhadrasya mahātmanaḥ

original: 04,067.034d*1163_001 dhaumyaḥ śiṣyaiḥ parivṛto bhānumān iva raśmibhiḥ
analyzed: dhaumyaḥ śiṣyaiḥ parivṛtaḥ bhānumān iva raśmibhiḥ
tatas vivāhaḥ vavṛdhe sphītaḥ sarva guṇa anvitaḥ

original: 04,067.034d*1164_002 saubhadrasyādbhutaś caiva pitus tava pitus tadā
analyzed: saubhadrasya adbhutaḥ ca eva pituḥ tava pituḥ tadā
dhaumyaḥ śiṣyaiḥ parivṛtaḥ juhāva agnau vidhānataḥ

original: 04,067.034d*1165_002 agniṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kurvan saubhadraḥ pāṇim agrahīt
analyzed: agnim pradakṣiṇam kurvan saubhadraḥ pāṇim agrahīt

original: 04,067.034d*1166_001 tataḥ pārthāya saṃhṛṣṭo mātsyarājo dhanaṃ mahat
analyzed: tatas pārthāya saṃhṛṣṭaḥ mātsya rājaḥ dhanam mahat
tasmai sapta sahasrāṇi hayānām vāta raṃhasām

original: 04,067.035c dve ca nāgaśate mukhye prādād bahu dhanaṃ tadā
analyzed: dve ca nāga śate mukhye prādāt bahu dhanam tadā
prādāt matsya patiḥ hṛṣṭaḥ kanyādhanam anuttamam
pāribarham ca pārthasya pradadau matsya puṃgavaḥ
kṛṣṇena saha kaunteyaḥ pratyagṛhṇāt prabhūta vat
hutvā samyak samiddha agnim arcayitvā dvijanmanaḥ

original: 04,067.035d*1169_002 rājyaṃ balaṃ ca kośaṃ ca sarvam ātmānam eva ca
analyzed: rājyam balam ca kośam ca sarvam ātmānam eva ca
nyavedayan pāṇḍavebhyaḥ virāṭaḥ prītimān tadā

original: 04,067.036a kṛte vivāhe tu tadā dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
analyzed: kṛte vivāhe tu tadā dharmaputraḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: 04,067.036c brāhmaṇebhyo dadau vittaṃ yad upāharad acyutaḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dadau vittam yat upāharat acyutaḥ
go sahasrāṇi ratnāni vastrāṇi vividhāni ca

original: 04,067.037c bhūṣaṇāni ca mukhyāni yānāni śayanāni ca
analyzed: bhūṣaṇāni ca mukhyāni yānāni śayanāni ca
paṭṭavāsāṃsi citrāṇi dāsī dāsān bahūn dadau

original: 04,067.037d*1172_001 nāgarān prītibhir divyais tarpayām āsa bhūpatiḥ
analyzed: nāgarān prītibhiḥ divyaiḥ tarpayām āsa bhūpatiḥ

original: 04,067.037d*1173_001 bhojanāni ca hṛdyāni pānāni vividhāni ca
analyzed: bhojanāni ca hṛdyāni pānāni vividhāni ca
tat mahā utsava saṃkāśam hṛṣṭa puṣṭa jana āvṛtam
nagaram matsya rājasya śuśubhe bharata ṛṣabha

original: 04,067.038d*1174_001 purohitair amātyaiś ca paurair jānapadair api
analyzed: purohitaiḥ amātyaiḥ ca pauraiḥ jānapadaiḥ api
virāṭa nṛpatiḥ śrīmān saubhadrāya abhimanyave

original: 04,067.038d*1174_003 tāṃ sutām uttarāṃ dattvā mumude paramaṃ tadā
analyzed: tām sutām uttarām dattvā mumude paramam tadā

original: 04,067.038d*1175_001 evaṃ vṛtte vivāhe tu pārthasūnoḥ paraṃtapa
analyzed: evam vṛtte vivāhe tu pārtha sūnoḥ paraṃtapa

original: 04,067.038d*1175_002 purād bahir upaplāvya ūṣuḥ pāṇḍusutās tadā
analyzed: purāt bahis upaplāvya ūṣuḥ pāṇḍu sutāḥ tadā
janamejayaḥ

original: 04,067.038d*1176_001 vṛtte vivāhe hṛṣṭātmā yad uvāca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
analyzed: vṛtte vivāhe hṛṣṭa ātmā yat uvāca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: 04,067.038d*1176_002 tat sarvaṃ kathayasveha kṛtavanto yad uttaram
analyzed: tat sarvam kathayasva iha kṛtavantaḥ yat uttaram
caturtham etat vipulam vairāṭam parva varṇanam
atra api parisaṃkhyātāḥ adhyāyānām mahātmanā

original: 04,067.038d*1177_003 saptaṣaṣṭir atho pūrṇā ślokānām api me śṛṇu
analyzed: saptaṣaṣṭiḥ atho pūrṇā ślokānām api me śṛṇu

original: 04,067.038d*1177_004 ślokānāṃ dve sahasre tu trīṇi ślokaśatāni ca
analyzed: ślokānām dve sahasre tu trīṇi śloka śatāni ca
parvaṇi asmin samākhyātam saṃkhyānam parama ṛṣiṇā
virāṭaparve deyāni vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca
kṛtvā vivāham tu kuru pravīrāḥ
tadā abhimanyoḥ muditasya pakṣāḥ
viśramya catvāri uṣasaḥ pratītāḥ
sabhām virāṭasya tatas bhijagmuḥ
